Instruction: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Chop onion, carrot, and celery. Add to the pot and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Mince garlic and add to the pot. Cook for 1 minute more.
Add lentils, crushed tomatoes, vegetable broth, oregano, basil, and bay leaf to the pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Remove bay leaf. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
